body:
I don't know if it is up, but I cannot access the server. If it still is down, When will it be back up?
Thanks
As always,Nebbae

title: When will avicus be back up

replies.body: Only the hubs are down, so as stated above, use direct connect.
replies.body_tagged: Only the hubs are down, so as stated above, use direct connect.

replies.body: For me, Avicus is up for me, without direct connect.
replies.body_tagged: For me, Avicus is up for me, without direct connect.

replies.body:
You can direct connect to a specific server with these IPs:
mczone01.avic.us
mczone02.avic.us
etc.
Once you've connected to that specific server,  /hub it and you're sweet.
replies.body_tagged:

replies.body: Thanks guys it actually just started to work
replies.body_tagged: Thanks guys it actually just started to work

replies.body: Since Avicus is now working again, this thread will be locked as it serves no more purpose. Remember that if you ever need help on logging on to avicus, use the other IP's or just be patient! Thanks!
